name: SAN JOAQUIN VALLEY AIR POLLUTION CONTROL DISTRICT
description: Regional governmental entity that regulates air pollution
sampleDescriptions: Regulatory proposals related to Section 185 of the Clean Air Act; Monitor EQUIP provisions of farm bill related to air quality.
Monitor FY18 (HR 1625) and FY19 Department of Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, funding for retrofitting engines to meet Clean Air Act requirements.
